(Attachments: # 1 Declaration of Ryder Ripps, # 2 Exhibit 1: List of NFT projects that use BAYC NFT images, # 3 Declaration of Louis Tompros, # 4 Exhibit 1: Excerpts of https://rrbayc.com webpage, # 5 Exhibit 2: https://gordongoner.com webpage, # 13 Exhibit 10: 2020 Journal for the Study of Radicalism, Vol. 14, No. 2, article on the Alt-Right and the Neofascist Movement in the United States, # 14 Exhibit 11: October 21, 2019, https://digitalmethods.net chapter entry discussing the secret histories/dog whistles associated with neofascism on 4/chan/pol, # 18 Exhibit 15: Direct messages between Richard Spencer and Frederick Brennan, # 19 Exhibit 16: July 31, 2022, https://waveninja.substack.com article discussing Yuga co-founder Wylie Aronows admitted connections to an Alt-Right publisher, # 20 Exhibit 17: March 31, 2019, IdentifyEvropa article on Alt-Right activities in the United States, # 21 Exhibit 18: GH Records page for the Surf The Kali Yuga T-Shirt, # 22 Exhibit 19: Compiled Twitter posts criticizing Yuga Labs, Inc.s use of simianization, # 23 Exhibit 20: February 1, 2022, Input Magazine article including criticism from ADL senior researchers on racist imagery in the Bored Ape Yacht Club, # 24 Exhibit 21: OpenSea listing for BAYC #3721, # 28 Exhibit 25: Mr. Rippss May 14, 2022, 9:52 p.m. Twitter post, # 29 Exhibit 26: May 13, 2022, Boardroom article identifying celebrity owners of Bored Ape Yacht Club NFTs, # 30 Exhibit 27: Mr. Rippss May 14, 2022, 7:34 p.m. Twitter post, # 31 Exhibit 28: Mr. Rippss May 15, 2022, 1:21 a.m. Twitter post, # 32 Exhibit 29: June 24, 2022, The Coin Republic article on the #BURNBAYC movement and Yuga propagating racism, # 33 Exhibit 30: July 3, 2022, Decrypt article discussing background events associated with Yugas lawsuit against Mr. Ripps and Mr. Cahen, # 34 Exhibit 31: July 14, 2022, The Manual article discussing public debate on Yugas racism, # 35 Exhibit 32: July 23, 2022, Cryptopolitan article discussing the public opinion crisis regarding Yugas Nazi-related NFTS, # 36 Exhibit 33: July 24, 2022, Cryptoslate article on a popular documentary that discusses Yugas use of Nazi imagery, # 37 Exhibit 34: July 27, 2022, The Defiant article including commentary on Mr. Rippss artistic achievement with the RR/BAYC project, #
